CustomField.formula: IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Commercial_Industrial_Facade_and_Property_Improvement_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Commercial_Industrial_Facade_and_Property_Improvement"),"BIA Commercial - Industrial Facade and Property Improvement", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Innovation_Fund_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Innovation_Fund"),"BIA Innovation Fund", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Leadership_Fund_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Leadership_Fund"),"BIA Leadership Fund", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Outside_Mural_and_Street_Art_Grant_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Outside_Mural_and_Street_Art_Grant"),"BIA Outside Mural and Street Art", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Streetscape_Master_Plan_Funding_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "BIA_Streetscape_Master_Plan_Funding"),"BIA Streetscape Master Plan Funding", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Incubation_Grant_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Business_Incubation_Grant"),"Business Incubation Grant", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "Event_Sponsorship_Grant_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Event_Sponsorship_Grant"),"Event Sponsorship Grant", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "IMIT_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "IMIT"),"IMIT", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "Starter_Company_Grant"),"Starter Company", IF((RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sector_Grant_Read_Only" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sector_Grant"),"Sector Grant", ""))))))))))
CustomField.label: Record Type Name Formula
